p: The median duration of fever was similar between the baloxavir and oseltamivir groups: 41.2 (95% CI: 24.5–45.7) versus 46.8 (30.0–53.5) hours, respectively (Table 3), as was the duration of all symptoms: 66.4 (95% CI: 43.7–76.4) versus 67.9 (45.8–88.7) hours, respectively. The median time to return to normal health and activity was similar in the baloxavir and oseltamivir groups [116.5 (95% CI: 94.9–138.0) hours vs. 111.6 (80.8–138.3) hours, respectively].
